bibl.title: A Bilingual Account from the Aswan Quarries .
bibl.note: The Demotic and Greek texts on O. Brooklyn dem. 180 (= P. Brooklyn 81 for the Greek part) represent two portions of a single account, originating from a quarry somewhere in the neighborhood of Aswan and relating to a relatively brief quarrying or transportation project, taking place over just two days, but involving more than 60 laborers. - The Text and its Contents. - Function. - The Names. - Professional Groups. - Preliminary Conclusions.
